events.message: Customer has reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on highway 95. The incident occurred due to a collision with another car during heavy traffic.
The submitted claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the keywords found in the report such as 'vehicle', 'collision', and 'accident' properly identifying the case type.
An experienced claims agent specializing in auto accidents has been assigned to handle the case and assist the customer through the process.
Acknowledgement of the claim filing has been sent to the customer confirming receipt and providing an estimated timeline for processing the auto accident claim.
Request sent to the customer for detailed accident report, photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and any witness statements related to the collision.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including accident report and photos showing the extent of car damages from the collision.
Investigation team initiated a thorough review of the claim details, submitted documents, and police reports to validate the circumstances of the vehicle accident.
The investigation into the auto accident claim has concluded with confirmation that the customer’s vehicle damages are consistent with the described collision.
A settlement proposal has been offered to the customer based on the assessment of vehicle repair costs and policy coverage limits.
The customer responded to the settlement proposal positively and expressed appreciation for the clear communication and prompt handling of their accident claim.
The claim has been officially approved by the claims department after successful verification and agreement on the proposed settlement terms.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued to the customer’s account for vehicle repairs and associated expenses related to the accident.
The claim has been officially closed after successful settlement payment and confirmation from the customer that repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All records related to this auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference and compliance with regulatory requirements.
